attributes.action: Cap business premium customer service telephone lines
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am sure the whole country is fed up  with being charged premium rates,(0870 or 0845 numbers) when phoning up companies of whom you are a customer to get some information or have a problem.
Not only are you charged a high premium but are kept waiting for a minimum of 5 mins before even speaking to anyone.
